General.Name: Jiangsu Yueda Investment Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Yueda Investment Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the automobile, new energy, new materials, and intelligent manufacturing businesses in China and internationally. The company manufactures self-loading and unloading garbage trucks, passenger cars, tractors, and agricultural machineries; post-compression garbage trucks, multi-functional washing and sweeping vehicles, cleaning and sweeping vehicles, boat vehicles, isolation guardrail cleaning vehicles, high-pressure cleaning vehicles, kitchen garbage trucks, side-loading garbage trucks, electric sanitation vehicles, etc.; logistics and transportation equipment; and special-purpose machine tools, general-purpose machine tools, machining production lines, and machine tools. It also offers cotton yarn, gray cloth, and bed linings. In addition, the company is involved in the road toll management; thermal power generation; leasing; and machine tool upgradation activities. Jiangsu Yueda Investment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Yancheng, China.
General.Address: No. 2, Century Avenue East Road, Yancheng, China, 224007
